text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 960 in the Lenovo Y700-17ISK (80Q000C0US) 17.3" IPS Intel Core i7 6th Gen 6700HQ (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Fortnite. The build quality of the Lenovo Y700-17ISK (80Q000C0US) 17.3" IPS Intel Core i7 6th Gen 6700HQ (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Elden Ring. The build quality of the Lenovo Y700-17ISK (80Q000C0US) 17.3" IPS Intel Core i7 6th Gen 6700HQ (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
